Based on your preference cues, I would highly recommend 'The Rise of Theodore Roosevelt' (1979) from this list.
The film tells the story of America's 26th President, Theodore Roosevelt, who fought against the spread of British and French colonialism throughout much of the world.
The film is well-acted by actors such as John Huston playing Roosevelt and James Earl Jones playing Assistant Secretary of State Robert Truman. The film also has some great cinematography.
Overall, 'The Rise of Theodore Roosevelt' (1979) is a must-watch film for anyone interested in the history of the United States or the politics of the world.
I hope you find this recommendation helpful and that you enjoy watching 'The Rise of Theodore Roosevelt' (1979).
